jd_information.description: · Handle customers mainly for International Flights bookings.· Domestic & International Ticketing.· Amendments & cancellation.· Assist in International booking Invoicing.· Cancellation & refund process.· Debtor’s follow-ups.· Excellent Knowledge of Amadeus.· Sound knowledge of Domestic and International Flight fares.· Willing to work in 24*7 shifts.· Excellent Communication skills (English, Hindi, Punjabi).· Good stability background.· Good Written English skills.* Immediate Joining Required Location: Neta Ji Subhash Place, Pitampura, DelhiSalary: INR Best in Industry  Desired Candidate Profile:-1. Exp- 2-5 years (Ticketing process)2. Excellent Communication skills.3. Good knowledge of MS-Office Word, Excel, PowerPoint4. Should be presentable5. Experience on any of the GDS-Amadeus/Sabre/Galileo/Other will be preferred
